description: Trail Follows dry creek bed for a kilo. then follows a very promenent ridge. Trail dissappears near summit must make own trail to summit.
directions: Drive 65.4 Kilometers northwest on the Alaska highway (Hiway #1) from Whitehorse. Turn left onto Kusawa Lake road. Drive another 24 km. until reaching the Kusawa Lake camp ground. Drive through campground trail head is just before wooden bridge.
title: Kusawa Ridge Trail
